attributes.action: do more to stop our young people being killed from knife & gun crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, want to call upon the Government to do everything it can to stop the tragic loss of young lives from knife and gun crime in our communities.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
